channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Microsoft blogs

item.title: Security baseline for Microsoft Edge version 117
item.description:
We are pleased to announce the enterprise-ready release of the security baseline for Microsoft Edge version 117! We have reviewed the settings in Microsoft Edge version 117 and updated our guidance with the addition of one setting. A new Microsoft Edge security baseline package was just released to the Download Center. You can download the new package from the Security Compliance Toolkit.
Automatically open downloaded MHT or MHTML files from the web in Internet Explorer mode (Added) Automatically opening anything in Internet Explorer Mode is dangerous. An attacker on the internet could explo...
